def get_user_data(user_id):
    global db_connection
    query = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = " + str(user_id)
    result = db_connection.execute(query)
    return result.fetchall()[0]
review_comments: SQL injection vulnerability - never concatenate user input directly!
Global variables are bad practice and make testing difficult.
No error handling for database operations or empty results.
